segments.text: I have been looking at this online catalog for over an hour and I still haven ’ t finished getting all the kitchen appliances that we need !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the first thing on my list is a new blender . I decided to also get a juicer and a new coffee maker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t forget to also get a new mixer . I lent the old one to my brother and he broke it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah I know . I also decided to throw away the old toaster and get a new one . I am also getting a rice cooker and steamer to make some nice steamed fish or veggies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m actually thinking of completely refurnishing the kitchen and getting a new stove , oven , dishwasher and trash compacter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s a good idea ! The kitchen will look amazing !
segments.speaker: S1
